0:
dbs:
  - path: "/config/authfile.db"
    replicas:
      - &nas
        name: "nas"
        type: "file"
        path: "/nfs-authfile"
        retention: "168h"
        validation-interval: "1h"
      - &r2
        name: "r2"
        type: "s3"
        endpoint: "$${R2_ENDPOINT}"
        bucket: "$${R2_BUCKET}"
        path: "ntfy-authfile"
        force-path-style: true
        retention: "168h"
        validation-interval: "24h"
        age:
          recipients: ["$${AGE_PUBKEY}"]
          identities: ["$${AGE_SECRET}"]
  - path: "/config/cache.db"
    replicas:
      - <<: *nas
        path: "/nfs-cache"
      - <<: *r2
        path: "ntfy-cache"
